summary: PASSENGER SIDE BOTH DOORS PERMANENTLY LOCKED.  COULD NOT OPEN MANUALLY.  HAD ONE FIXED WHICH COST APPROX 400.00.  MY CONCERN IF ALL DOORS HAD LOCKED ALL AT ONCE I WOULD BE TRAPPED INSIDE.  THIS IS DANGEROUS ESPECIALLY IF I HAD A CHILD INSIDE.  I FEEL WE NEED A RECALL.  I HAVE NEVER HAD SUCH A PROBLEM IN ANY OTHER CAR.  I FEEL THIS IS HAZARDOUS...  *TR
